definitions.definition: a swollen area within body tissue, containing an accumulation of pus.
examples: ulcer, ulceration, cyst, boil, blister, sore, pustule, carbuncle, pimple, wen, whitlow, canker; Moreinflammation, infection, eruption "the abscess is what's causing the pain"Moreinflammation, infection, eruption the abscess is what's causing the pain
